content: **about this project-** this is part of a series of hats and scarves dedicated to very special women and girls who are very dear to me **crochet leve**l- intermediate the hannah scarf can be made as long or as short as you would like the fringe is crocheted onto the scarf but is completely optional if you don t like fringe any yarn or hook size can be used to make this project worsted weight yarn and size j hook are suggestions only feel free to use as many colors as desired
